logoPrompt: A modern, elegant logo for 'Coastal Breeze Spa'. Include soothing elements like waves and a seashell. Use a calming blue color palette to match a wellness spa by the seaside, in a minimalist style.

hero.headline: Relax and Rejuvenate by the Seaside
hero.subheadline: Unwind with our expertly crafted spa treatments in beautiful Bournemouth.

about.title: About Us
about.description: At Coastal Breeze Spa, we offer a sanctuary of relaxation on the stunning Bournemouth coast. Our experienced therapists specialize in rejuvenating massage therapy, revitalizing facials, invigorating body wraps, and holistic aromatherapy, providing a holistic approach to wellness and relaxation.
about.imagePrompt: A serene, photorealistic scene of a spa interior with massage tables, delicate lighting, and a window view of the Bournemouth coast. Include elements like candles and calming blues to evoke tranquility. High resolution, inviting atmosphere.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Discover a range of personalized spa treatments designed to relax, rejuvenate, and renew your mind and body.

items.title: Massage Therapy
items.description: Release tension and relieve pain with our tailored massage sessions.

items.title: Facials
items.description: Revitalize your skin with our custom facial treatments.

items.title: Body Wraps
items.description: Detoxify and nourish your skin with our luxurious body wraps.

items.title: Aromatherapy
items.description: Enhance your well-being with our soothing aromatherapy treatments.

items.title: Expert Therapists
items.description: Our team of highly trained therapists are committed to providing personalized care and exceptional experiences.

items.title: Coastal Location
items.description: Enjoy the tranquility of a spa experience by the seaside, with stunning views over Bournemouth.

items.title: Holistic Approach
items.description: We offer treatments that nurture the body, mind, and spirit, ensuring complete relaxation.

images.title: Massage Room
images.description: Our cozy and welcoming massage room.
images.imagePrompt: A professionally captured image of a tranquil massage room, showcasing soft lighting, plush massage tables, and peaceful decor. Elements like candles and essential oils provide a warm glow. High-definition, welcoming space.

images.title: Facial Area
images.description: Where rejuvenation begins with our facial treatments.
images.imagePrompt: A high-resolution image of a facial treatment area, featuring a comfortable chair, organized skincare products, and gentle ambient lighting. Professional, clean, and inviting atmosphere.

images.title: Reception
images.description: Our friendly welcome space for clients.
images.imagePrompt: A photorealistic image of a spa reception area with a modern minimalist design. Features include a welcoming reception desk, gentle blue and white tones, and calming plants. High-quality, professional look.

quotes.name: Emily R.
quotes.quote: The best spa experience I've ever had! The setting is beautiful and the staff is incredibly caring.

quotes.name: James T.
quotes.quote: I left feeling completely rejuvenated. The deep tissue massage was exceptional.

items.question: What should I bring for my spa visit?
items.answer: Just bring yourself and an open mind for relaxation. Towels and robes are provided.

items.question: Are your treatments suitable for all skin types?
items.answer: Yes, our therapists will tailor treatments to suit your individual skin needs.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Reach out to us to book your relaxing getaway at Coastal Breeze Spa.
